thread.title: Research and Markets: Philippines Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025
thread.title_full: Research and Markets: Philippines Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025

title: Research and Markets: Philippines Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025
text:
DUBLIN--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/pz557n/philippines_oil ) has announced the addition of the "Philippines Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025 - Blocks, Fields, Production Outlook, SWOT, Companies and Market Structure of Philippines Upstream" report to their offering. 
The Philippines upstream oil and gas analysis and outlook report provides complete information on Philippines exploration and production blocks, fields, companies and future prospects. Details of the industry growth in the historic period coupled with future growth prospects are provided in detail. 
The Philippines oil and gas reserves, replacement ratios, proven volumes, along with detailed insights into the role of the Philippines in region and global upstream markets, is provided in detail. Further, complete infrastructure details of the Philippines field-wise production, field-by-field details, exploration blocks on offer, available blocks and existing block details in the Philippines are provided in the research work. 
Field-wise production in the Philippines and company-wise production are provided historically for each year between 2005 and 2012. Further, the Philippines upstream E&P market structure of the industry based on oil and gas production for leading companies is also provided in the report. 
Business profiles of three leading oil and gas producing companies in the Philippines along with their business description, strategies, SWOT and financial details are included. Further, all major industry updates and their impact on the Philippines oil and gas EP industry are analyzed in the report. 
Key Topics Covered: 
2 Introduction to the Philippines Upstream Oil and Gas Markets 
3 Importance of the Philippines Upstream Market in Region and Global Front 
4 Key Trends, Market Drivers and Challenges Facing Companies in the Philippines Upstream Sector 
5 The Philippines oil and gas production and consumption forecasts to 2025 
6 The Philippines Oil and gas Field Details 
7 The Philippines Field wise Oil and Gas Production, 2005-2012 
8 The Philippines Exploration Sector Analysis 
9 The Philippines Exploration and Production Market Competitive Landscape 
For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/pz557n/philippines_oil . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150729006461/en/ Contact:
